alert.note: Alert for Scott (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 8:52PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Scott County through 930 PM CDT... At 852 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carver, or 23 miles southwest of Minneapolis, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jordan around 855 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include New Prague and Elko New Market. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 76 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
